Key Match Events: Reed Sheppard, the No. 3 pick in the 2024 NBA draft, had an underwhelming performance with 0 points, 1 rebound, and 1 assist in six minutes of play.
Stephon Castle, picked by the Spurs, had a significant impact on both ends of the floor and hit crucial free throws, the last of which gave the Spurs a 109-106 lead.
Pre-Game Insights: Many looked forward to the matchup between Reed Sheppard and Stephon Castle, who the Spurs picked after Sheppard went to Houston.
